00062 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00063 #include <config.h>
00064 #include <stdio.h>
00065 #include <stdarg.h>
00066 #include <stdlib.h>
00067 #include <string.h>
00068 #include <strings.h>
00069 #include "i_io.h"
00070 #include <library/i_error.h>
00071 
00072 FILE *
00073 I_open_output_file (char *name)
00074 {
00075   FILE *F = 0;
00076 
00077   if (!strcmp (name, "stdout"))
00078     {
00079       return stdout;
00080     }
00081   if (!strcmp (name, "stderr"))
00082     {
00083       return stderr;
00084     }
00085 
00086   F = fopen (name, "w");
00087   if (F == 0)
00088     I_punt ("cannot open output file");
00089 
00090   /*
00091    * Change the default buffer size to 64K, to increase
00092    * i/o performance.
00093    */
00094 #ifdef SETVBUF_REVERSED
00095   setvbuf (F, _IOFBF, NULL, 64 * 1024);
00096 #else
00097   setvbuf (F, NULL, _IOFBF, 64 * 1024);
00098 #endif
00099 
00100   return (F);
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 void
00105 I_close_output_file (FILE * F)
00106 {
00107   if (F == NULL)
00108     I_punt ("L_close_output_file: trying to close NULL file");
00109 
00110   if ((F == stdin) || (F == stdout) || (F == stderr))
00111     return;
00112   fclose (F);
00113   F = NULL;
00114 }
